title: european technical indoor - how to grow hemp step by step

european technical indoor - how to grow hemp step by step

Well, here is a large file (7.54 GB!). I just ripped the DVD without compressing it to .avi. Like this you have all the five languages (english, french, spanish, esker, italian and german) and all the menus are working ...

You can burn this on a DoubleLayer 8,5GB DVD+R.
